topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5535bad063687258493c0400#post_5535bad063687258493c0400
Basically it's a super over-the-top shonen battle manga centered around the acquisition, preparation, and inevitable consumtion of food. And some of these ingredients are super hardcore. Like this thing!
!http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/toriko-fan-fiction/images/0/02/WisdomPanda.png/revision/latest?cb=20140506193900!
Toriko was expected to fight and kill this thing. WITH HIS BARE HANDS! ALL SO HE COULD EAT IT!
